Lyon Summer School in Empirical Research Methods - ENS de Lyon" author: "Vincent Bagilet" date: "2025-07-01" # bibliography: ../env_econ.bib format: pdf # revealjs: # theme: [default, vb_qmd.scss] # slide-number: true # title-slide-attributes: # data-background-color: "#392F29" # slide-number: false # embed-resources: true --- ::: {.cell} ::: # Intro {.inverse} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gapminder::gapminder |> filter(country == "France") |> ggplot(aes(x = year, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](slides_data_viz_summer_files/figure-pdf/unnamed-chunk-1-1.pdf){fig-pos='H'} ::: ::: # Introduction {.inverse} ## Périmètre de ce cours ::: {.centered} - Une thématique étudiée par de nombreuses disciplines (sociologie, sciences politiques, économie) - On se concentre sur la littérature en économie - Approche en économie (d'après @cantoni_protests_2024) : - **Cadre théorique** aux comportements rationnels des individus - **Évaluation empirique** et causale des comportements - **Activisme**: attitude politique qui favorise l'action directe et la propagande active^[Définition donnée par Le Robert.] ::: # Key data viz principles {.inverse} ## Perception - Theory on principle # Building a graph {.inverse} ## Know what types exists ::: {.centered} - Know what is possible to do to **find what you need** - Know **graph names** (to search the internet regarding how to code them) - Refer to existing graph galleries ::: --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Choosing a graph type ::: {.centered} - What do you want to show in your graph? - **What is the main message you want to convey?** - With the same data, you can: - Tell a lot of different stories - Emphasize different points ::: ## One data, many graphs, many stories ::: {.cell} ::: - How to choose the right type?
